name: TimeBomb!
description:
Welcome to TimeBomb!

In the game Timebomb, players enter a maze-like dungeon with a bomb in front of them that detonates when touched. The objective is to escape the maze before the time runs out and the bomb explodes, leading to an unfortunate end. This 128x128 pixel screen game has a thrilling and intense atmosphere as players are racing against the clock to survive the maze and find the exit. The bomb serves as a constant reminder of the ticking time, adding to the sense of urgency. The game is about finding the exit and being strategic, as players need to avoid traps and obstacles in their path. Can you make it out of the maze before the bomb detonates? Play Timebomb and find out!

How to play?

There are only four pressable keys.

W move up

S move down

A move left

D move right
